name: HUUM HIVE Mini 6 kW Electric Sauna Heater
description: The HUUM HIVE Mini ranks as the second most popular model in the HUUM heater lineup, following the Drop. Unlike the Drop, which is wall-mounted, the HIVE Mini is a floor-standing heater, consistent with the design of other HUUM models except for the Drop. A standout feature of the HIVE Mini is its exceptional stone capacity, the largest across all HUUM models, which significantly enhances its heating performance and steam production capabilities.

controls.description: Smart control with mobile app connectivity

images.alt: HUUM DROP Electric Sauna Heater 6kW - Front View
HUUM DROP Electric Sauna Heater 6kW - Side View
HUUM DROP Electric Sauna Heater 6kW - Installed View
HUUM DROP Electric Sauna Heater 6kW - Detail View

requirements: Minimum 55 kg of sauna stones with 5-10 cm diameter

features.title: Large Stone Capacity
features.description: Holds up to 15 kg of stones for optimal heat retention and steam generation

features.title: Space-Saving Design
features.description: The “Mini” in its name distinguishes it from the larger HIVE models, which offer higher power options of 12 kW, 15 kW, and 18 kW. The HIVE Mini, on the other hand, is available in 6 kW, 9 kW, and 10.5 kW sizes.

features.title: Smart Control Option
features.description: Optional WiFi control for remote operation via smartphone

features.title: Elegant Aesthetics
features.description: Unique water drop design adds a sophisticated touch to your sauna
